privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Carteron Industries, we highly value the protection of your personal data and privacy.
privacy.section1_text:
We only collect the information strictly necessary for the site's operation and to handle your requests via our contact form (name, email address, message, etc.).
No data is shared with third parties without your consent.
privacy.section2_text:
Our site does not use cookies for tracking, advertising, or analytics purposes.
Only technical cookies essential for the site's proper functioning may be used.
privacy.section3_text:
The information you send via the contact form is only used to respond to your inquiries.
It is not sold or used for commercial purposes.
privacy.section4_text: We implement all necessary measures to ensure the security of your data.
privacy.section5_text: In accordance with applicable regulations, you have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at: ton-email@domaine.com
privacy.section6_text: This privacy policy may be updated at any time. We encourage you to check it regularly.

privacy_banner: We do not collect any personal data for commercial or advertising purposes. Your privacy is respected.

carousel.side_desc: At Carteron Industries, we place innovation and technology at the service of agriculture and well-being. Our products and services are designed to meet concrete needs, with both a human and technological approach.
carousel.about_intro: Carteron Industries represents a modern vision of agriculture and mobility. Founded on systems engineering expertise, the company develops intelligent solutions for the agricultural world and outdoor leisure. We believe in useful, sustainable technology adapted to field realities.
carousel.about_parcours: PhD engineer in electronics and physics, Lamia Carteron founded Carteron Industries after more than 15 years of R&D experience in optimizing thermal, hybrid, electric vehicles and agricultural machinery. She has collaborated with major names in the automotive industry and agricultural sector. Today, she puts her expertise at the service of an innovative solution in the leisure domain, the result of a unique combination between her passion for automotive engineering, her love for golf and her family life.

ai.name: Agricultural System Engineering
ai.desc: Discover our services in agricultural system engineering
ai.popup: Innovation at the heart of farming operations. At CARTERON Industries, we understand the challenges faced by agricultural equipment manufacturers. Whether improving the efficiency of your equipment, complying with environmental standards, or developing innovative solutions, we are here to support you. We work with farm equipment manufacturers, tractor and machinery producers, and agricultural suppliers to deliver custom-made solutions tailored to their specific needs.

astrology.name: Web & Mobile Apps for Agricultural Weighing
astrology.popup: Boost your productivity with our innovative solutions. We offer connected tools for farmers to track their weighing operations, monitor inventory, prepare weighing environments, and follow their activities from mobile, tablet, or computer.

innovation.name: Electric Golf Trolleys
innovation.popup: We offer lightweight, foldable, connected electric golf trolleys with navigation systems. Our mission is to provide market alternatives at lower cost than our competitors.

work.name: Work & Performance
work.popup: Solutions to work better every day.

project.name: Project & Vision
project.popup: Your project, our expertise for tomorrow.

card1.title: Agricultural System Engineering
card1.desc: We support agricultural manufacturers and equipment suppliers in the design, development, and optimization of their technical systems. Our approach relies on systems engineering, functional analysis, and field expertise to ensure robust, sustainable, and profitable solutions.

card2.title: Web & Mobile Apps for Agricultural Weighing
card2.desc: Our digital solution allows logging and managing weighing operations via intuitive interfaces connected to tractors with front loaders. Optimize your logistics, save time, and enjoy full traceability.

card3.title: Electric Golf Trolleys
card3.desc: Designed for demanding golfers, our electric trolleys combine performance, range, and ergonomics. Developed with silent motors and intuitive navigation, they enhance the experience on the green.

card4.title: 2-in-1 Stroller & Golf Trolley Hybrid
card4.desc: A unique innovation: a hybrid trolley designed for active parents, combining the functionality of a stroller and a motorized golf cart. Perfect to balance sport and family without compromise.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers about our innovative solutions for modern agriculture and engineering services.

faq1.q: What technology solutions does Carteron Industries offer?
faq1.a: Carteron Industries offers a comprehensive range of innovative technology solutions for modern agriculture. Our solutions include smart automation systems, IoT sensors for crop monitoring, farm management software, and precision equipment for resource optimization. We also develop custom solutions tailored to the specific needs of each farm.

faq2.q: How can I benefit from Carteron Industries’ engineering services?
faq2.a: Our engineering services help optimize your agricultural processes through a personalized approach. We analyze your farm, identify areas for improvement, and design custom solutions. Our engineers support you from design to implementation, ensuring perfect integration and comprehensive training for your teams to maximize the benefits.

faq3.q: Does Carteron Industries offer maintenance support for its solutions?
faq3.a: Yes, Carteron Industries offers full maintenance support for all its solutions. Our technical team is available 24/7 to ensure your equipment operates smoothly. We offer preventive maintenance contracts, emergency repairs, and regular software updates to guarantee optimal performance.

faq4.q: Can Carteron Industries customize solutions to my specific needs?
faq4.a: Absolutely! Customization is at the core of our approach. Every farm is unique, and we adapt our solutions accordingly. Our engineers work closely with you to understand your needs, assess your working environment, and develop perfectly tailored solutions.
